content: before shipping it does not have to be individually wrapped you may put several bandages into one big plastic bag why the need for cotton bandages -these can be washed and reused -these do not wear out too fast unlike gauge and other bandages please send finished bandages to department of dermatology 1st floor outpatient department philippine general hospital 317 padre faura st ermita manila 1000 philippines please add a note if possible please deliver packages from monday to friday 8 00 am-5 00 pm closed on weekends and holidays project started april 4 2024 this is an ongoing project there is no deadline crocheted cotton retention bandage page 3
